scenario.title: Corporate Data Breach - Legacy FTP Server
scenario.description: A corporate whistleblower has leaked that sensitive financial documents are stored on an old FTP server at DataCorp Industries. The server was thought to be decommissioned, but intelligence suggests it's still running with default configurations. Your mission is to infiltrate the server and retrieve the classified budget report.
stages: Reconnaissance: Discover the FTP service running on the target server
Access: Exploit anonymous FTP login to browse available directories
Exploration: Navigate through directory structure to find hidden folders
Data Recovery: Locate encrypted files and find decryption materials
Flag Extraction: Decrypt the classified document to reveal the flag
